GSD.description:
btrfs: raid56: don't trust any cached sector in __raid56_parity_recover()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.62 by commit 2a9114b3ec6f9d195e7744e50dc13937a88d48db. For more details please see the references link.
